text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

Raskolnikov and Razumihin in conversation  
Raskolnikov feels uneasy.  
Razumihin: “She isn’t, is she?”  

Raskolnikov: “No,”  
Razumihin: “She’s not clever, is she?”  
Raskolnikov: “I don’t understand.”  

---  

Raskolnikov looks away, troubled.  
Razumihin: “She’s cherishing a design against you!”  

Raskolnikov: “It was base of me to lie…”  
Razumihin: “But you did it sensibly!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reflects on his deceit regarding his mother's financial situation and the implications it has on his relationships.
